name: Twemple
overview:
Twemple transforms your city into a giant store.

Users locate a product they want to recommend to their friends via a smartphone, live from a store or any place. The product is instantly shared through Twitter and Facebook. So they get a feedback in real time which is very useful during shopping and they help their friends to discover cool products and cool brands in cool places. Users can also twemp used products they want to sell to people nearby. By twemping products users earn points, get titles and climb the Twemple hierarchy.

Twemple is also an easy way to find the best deals in a city in real time. Users create a shopping list on their phone and then go in stores to see items in real just before buy it.

Twemple application is available for iPhone and soon for Android and Blackberry.
